title: Unit 8: Films - Although, Despite/In spite of

theory.brief: Although/Though + S + V (mặc dù + mệnh đề). Despite/In spite of + N/V-ing (mặc dù + danh từ/V-ing). However/Nevertheless (tuy nhiên) - đứng đầu câu hoặc giữa 2 câu, có dấu phẩy hoặc chấm phẩy. Tất cả đều diễn tả sự tương phản.
examples: Although the film was long, it was interesting. (Mặc dù phim dài, nó rất thú vị.)
Despite the bad weather, we went to the cinema. (Mặc dù thời tiết xấu, chúng tôi vẫn đi xem phim.)
In spite of being tired, she watched the movie. (Mặc dù mệt, cô ấy vẫn xem phim.)
The film was scary. However, I enjoyed it. (Phim đáng sợ. Tuy nhiên, tôi thích nó.)
Though it was expensive, he bought the ticket. (Mặc dù đắt, anh ấy vẫn mua vé.)

exercises.question: _______ the film was long, it was interesting.
_______ the bad reviews, the movie was popular.
_______ it was expensive, we bought tickets.
_______ being tired, she watched the film.
The film was scary. _______, I enjoyed it.
_______ she was sick, she went to the cinema.
_______ the rain, they went to see the movie.
_______ having little money, he bought a ticket.
The film got bad reviews. _______, it was successful.
_______ the plot was simple, the film was moving.
_______ his young age, he is a great actor.
_______ we arrived late, we didn't miss the beginning.
_______ the noise, I could hear the dialogue.
It was a comedy. _______, I didn't laugh much.
_______ trying hard, the actor failed.
_______ the film was boring, I watched it all.
hints: Sau chỗ trống là S + V

exercises.question: _______ the bad weather, we went out.
hints: Sau chỗ trống là danh từ

exercises.question: The film was long. _______, it was enjoyable.
exercises.explanation: However đứng giữa 2 câu độc lập

exercises.question: _______ being young, she is very talented.
_______ he practiced a lot, he failed the audition.
hints: Sau chỗ trống là mệnh đề
